  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/prettystacktraceentry">PrettyStackTraceEntry</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/prettystacktraceentry">PrettyStackTraceEntry</a> - This class is used to represent a frame of the &quot;pretty&quot; stack trace that is dumped when a program crashes. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/prettystacktraceentry/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/prettystacktracestring">PrettyStackTraceString</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/prettystacktracestring">PrettyStackTraceString</a> - This object prints a specified string (which should not contain newlines) to the stream as the stack trace when a crash occurs. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/prettystacktracestring/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/prettystacktraceformat">PrettyStackTraceFormat</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/prettystacktraceformat">PrettyStackTraceFormat</a> - This object prints a string (which may use printf-style formatting but should not contain newlines) to the stream as the stack trace when a crash occurs. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/prettystacktraceformat/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/prettystacktraceprogram">PrettyStackTraceProgram</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/prettystacktraceprogram">PrettyStackTraceProgram</a> - This object prints a specified program arguments to the stream as the stack trace when a crash occurs. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/prettystacktraceprogram/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns the topmost element of the &quot;pretty&quot; stack state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a91d84a6ad314d93eb88033ed8e5886a4">SavePrettyStackState</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Restores the topmost element of the &quot;pretty&quot; stack state to State, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// should come from a previous call to SavePrettyStackState().  This is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// useful when using a CrashRecoveryContext in code that also uses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// PrettyStackTraceEntries, to make sure the stack that&#39;s printed if a crash</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// happens after a crash that&#39;s been recovered by CrashRecoveryContext</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// doesn&#39;t have frames on it that were added in code unwound by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// CrashRecoveryContext.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab3d4374ae57f91d34b9e6397cc3b1974">RestorePrettyStackState</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;State);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
